channel.title: After adding custom emotes such as cj's or cocoas.. i get this?
channel.description:
Well i got my emotes working fine and fantastic from both of there tuts and all, but when i load my client i always get this in the CMB box wdf? It doesnt change anything but why the hell is it saying that??
[IMG]http://i334.photobucket.com/albums/m412/chiponbloc/er.jpg[/img]

item.title: After adding custom emotes such as cj's or cocoas.. i get this?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

doesnt make it go away lol, o well i give up, the w thing is good enough XD

Read full topic

item.title: After adding custom emotes such as cj's or cocoas.. i get this?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

@echo off javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Read full topic
item.source: After adding custom emotes such as cj's or cocoas.. i get this?

item.title: After adding custom emotes such as cj's or cocoas.. i get this?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

that just made it so the client wouldnt load what so ever…

this is my current one.

@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

I changed it to:

@echo off javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

The only thing this changes it that all the text in the cmb box doesnt show up. I want it so that the cmb box doesnt show up what so ever

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

that makes the stuff in the cmb box go away, but is there a way to make the ENTIRE cmb box go away not just the words, so when it loads, it will only load the client not the cmb box?

item.title: After adding custom emotes such as cj's or cocoas.. i get this?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

The “Read Error: iconNameHere” are not from the animation tutorial, it’s from the model preloading. I dunno why it does that. Just don’t use bluur’s client. It’s basically shit.
